item.title: Report E-2024100188
item.description:
Report E-2024100188

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-09T09:22:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-10
  • City: CHESTER
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 00:14 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal NRM. It was reported that approximately 2-pints of UN1263 Fast Dry Acrylic Enamel, BLACK released from (2) metal pails due to a forklift puncture. The release impacted concrete dock floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site.
